name: libdweb
description: Experimental WebExtensions API for enabling DWeb protocols
author: Irakli Gozalishvili <rfobic@gmail.com> (http://jeditoolkit.com)

scripts.test: npm run test:flow && npm run test:api && npm run test:tcp
scripts.//build: npm run build:node && npm run build:types
scripts.//prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run build:umd && npm test
scripts.//start: flow-copy-source --watch --verbose src lib & babel --watch --out-dir lib src
scripts.demo:discovery: cross-env MOZ_DISABLE_CONTENT_SANDBOX=1 web-ext run --firefox=nightly --browser-console --url about:debugging --source-dir demo/discovery
scripts.demo:protocol: cross-env MOZ_DISABLE_CONTENT_SANDBOX=1 web-ext run --firefox=nightly --browser-console --url about:debugging --source-dir demo/protocol
scripts.demo:fs: cross-env MOZ_DISABLE_CONTENT_SANDBOX=1 web-ext run --firefox=nightly --browser-console --url about:debugging --source-dir demo/fs
scripts.demo:dgram: cross-env MOZ_DISABLE_CONTENT_SANDBOX=1 web-ext run --firefox=nightly --browser-console --url about:debugging --source-dir demo/dgram
scripts.demo:tcp: cross-env MOZ_DISABLE_CONTENT_SANDBOX=1 web-ext run --firefox=nightly --browser-console --url about:debugging --source-dir demo/tcp
